Omiscid::SmartLocker

Omiscid::SmartLocker Class Reference

SmartLocker can check the lock is removed and them unlock it when destroyed. This class is designed to operate in functions. It is not thread safe. More...

#include <System/LockManagement.h>

bool Lock ()
 Function used to lock the LockableObject object.
bool Unlock ()
 Function used to unlock the LockableObject object.

Detailed Description

SmartLocker can check the lock is removed and them unlock it when destroyed. This class is designed to operate in functions. It is not thread safe.

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz
